articles.title: Participants in Joint Conference of DPRK Government, Political Parties and Organizations Send Letter to UN Secretariat
articles.content:
Participants in Joint Conference of DPRK Government, Political Parties and Organizations Send Letter to UN Secretariat
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry on June 13 conveyed a letter adopted at the joint conference of the Government, Political Parties and Organizations of the DPRK held on June 9 to the UN Secretariat.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government is rock firm and the struggle already began to resolutely wide open a new path of addressing the inter-Korean relations and the issue of reunification, upholding the line and policies for national reunification which were advanced by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The question is what attitude and position will be taken by the UN, which is deeply involved in the division of Korea and the reunification issue, and therefore should play an important role.
					
					 In fact, the UN assumes a historical, legal and moral responsibility for the reunification issue of Korea, from which it cannot turn away.
					
					 Indelible are all its crimes that brought misfortunes and sacrifice to the innocent Korean people by its unjust meddling in the issue of Korea, freezing inter-Korean division as well as sending multinational forces in abuse of the UN name to the war of aggression ignited by the United States in the 1950s of the last century.
					
					 If it remains true to the mandate and duty of safeguarding peace and security of the humanity and orienting toward global independence and justice, the UN should, though belatedly, duly compensate for the damage it caused by sincerely helping the Korean people achieve national reunification independently and peacefully.
					
					 However, the UN is badly treating the DPRK, a legitimate sovereign state and a member state of the UN backed by the U.S. that seeks the permanent division of the Korean peninsula, not its reunification.
					
					 The UN should not put pressure on the DPRK and other small countries with its double standards and rules centered on one single country and create countless obstacles to their independent aspiration and development but should screen the essence of the issues from a fair and objective angle and make due contribution to addressing issues.
					
					 When it comes to the issue of the reunification of Korea, the UN should neither connive at nor side with the U.S. which has pursued permanent division, meddling in the reunification issue of our country, but it should consistently adhere to the principle of respect for sovereignty and self-determination of our nation.
					
					 The genuine process for peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula can kick off only when the United States' hostile policy towards the DPRK is rolled back and the former unconditionally ceases extremely dangerous military provocations by the U.S. aggression troops who are occupying the southern part of Korea under the abused name of the United Nations.
					
					 The UN should have a fair handed look at and actively support the DPRK's will and desire for establishing a lasting peace mechanism on the Korean peninsula and creating favorable environment and climate for the reunification of Korea.
					
					 If the UN is sincerely interested in peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region, it should exercise its influence upon the U.S. so that it may give up its unjust aggressive ambition and hostile policy against the DPRK.
					
					 The UN will be disgracefully dubbed as a feeble international organization which is played by the dishonest and dirty trick if it is not able to correctly see the unjust and dangerous theory of unilateral "reunification under one regime" which has been obstinately pursued by the south Korean authorities ignoring the current realities on the Korean peninsula where different ideologies and systems have existed for decades.
					
					 And especially if the UN Secretary General and other senior officials move to the tune of the U.S. who is used to acts of arbitrariness and high-handedness, while expressing their willingness to mediate the issues for the improvement of inter-Korean relations and reunification, the UN will be branded an organization void of justice and fairness and its senior officials as figureheads lacking own vision and power.
					
					 Now is critical in deciding the destiny and future of our nation and we remain rock firm in our will to make significant progress in inter-Korean relations and fling the door of independent reunification open.
					
					 The UN should pay due attention to the aspiration of the Korean nation and the trend of times, and put into practice what it has to do as an organization mandated with ensuring international peace.
					
					 We hope that leading figures of the UN Secretariat including the Secretary-General would be recorded in the history of the United Nations for their positive contribution to easing tension on the Korean peninsula and the settlement of reunification issue which still remain the greatest concern for the world.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Blasts U.S. Plan for "Precision Air Raid Operation" against DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Blasts U.S. Plan for "Precision Air Raid Operation" against DPRK
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- We will further bolster up in quality and quantity the nuclear deterrence for self-defence in face of the U.S. reckless war moves and thoroughly foil any slightest military provocation of the enemies with the Korean-style mode of merciless counteraction.
					 A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Wednesday said this in an answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards a plan for "precision air raid operation" against the DPRK.
					
					 He noted:
					
					 A strategic information consulting company of the U.S. recently worked out and made public a report titled "Military counteraction to the nuclear issue of north Korea".
					
					 The five-chapter report envisages "precision air raid operation" against nuclear and military facilities in the DPRK to disenable its nuclear capabilities.
					
					 The report chose nuclear facilities in Nyongbyon, construction site of an atomic power plant, uranium mines and enrichment facilities as targets of air raid, and envisions making a simultaneous precision air raid on ballistic missiles of the strategic force, bombers of the air force and facilities of making submarines in the DPRK to destroy them at one blow.
					
					 To this end, scores of B-2 nuclear strategic bombers and F-22 stealth fighters loaded with large underground penetration bombs are supposed to be mobilized and several Ohio-class nuclear submarines and destroyers are to launch hundreds of Tomahawk cruise missiles.
					
					 The spokesman said that the open discussion of "precision air raid operation" against the DPRK in the U.S. reveals its undisguised ambition for a war of aggression against the DPRK that has entered an extremely reckless phase.
					
					 The publication of the extremely provocative report on precision air raid on nuclear facilities and nuclear force of the DPRK is a clear proof of the fact that the surprise preemptive attack and armed invasion against the DPRK are in the full-dress process of examination and preparation as it is just an extension of the U.S. administration's extreme sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and moves for a nuclear war against it, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the dangerous "war scenario" against the DPRK was made public with the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises due in upcoming August just at hand.
					
					 The gravity of the situation lies in that the U.S. is just about to fight a large-scale war for militarily stifling the DPRK, foreseeing that its "precision air raid operation" will inevitably spill over to an "all-out war".
					
					 The U.S. aggressive war moves which are becoming a reality on the Korean peninsula clearly prove once again the validity and the inevitability of the line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: North Side Committee Formed to Promote Inter-Korean Workers' Football Match
articles.content:
North Side Committee Formed to Promote Inter-Korean Workers' Football Match
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The north side committee for promoting the football match between workers from the north and the south for national reunification was formed with due ceremony in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					 Present at the inaugural ceremony were officials of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) and the industrial unions and trade union officials in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The speakers expressed conviction that the football match to be held in Seoul, south Korea on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation would offer an important occasion in defusing the inter-Korean confrontation, realizing the Koreans' aspiration for the improved inter-Korean relations and achieving national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 They declared that they would bring the football match to success without fail no matter what difficulties and trials may lie before them.
					
					 The north side committee was inaugurated at the ceremony with Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., GFTUK as chairman, according to the agreement on forming the joint committee for promoting the football match with the trade unions in south Korea. The north side committee comprised members of the C.C., GFTUK and industrial trade unions and officials concerned. 
					
					 A declaration on forming the joint committee for promoting the football match was made public.
					
					 The three workers organizations from the north and the south will turn out once again in the practical struggle for protecting the June 15 joint declaration and achieving the national reconciliation and peace, the declaration said, and went on:
					
					 First, we will bring to success the football match between workers from the north and the south for national reunification without fail in Seoul on the occasion of Aug. 15 (liberation day of Korea), this year 
					
					 Convinced that the determination and practice of the three workers organizations from the north and the south will offer an important occasion in improving the daily aggravated relations between the north and the south and achieving the national reconciliation and peace, we urge the south side authorities to make sincere efforts to make the football match successful.
					
					 Second, we will make positive efforts to defuse the daily increasing danger of a war and realize durable peace on this land.
					
					 War means the ruin of the nation and the workers will be the primary victims of the war.
					
					 Peace represents the co-existence and co-prosperity of the nation and peaceful living environment is most fundamental to the life of the workers.
					
					 That is why all the Korean workers in the north and the south oppose war and aspire after peace.
					
					 Third, we will positively pursue cooperation in consolidating All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and achieving the unity of all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 The situation still remains tense and we are faced with many difficulties.
					
					 However, we workers remain unchanged in our determination to take the lead in the efforts to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The promise of the workers in the north and the south to meet in Seoul again on August 15 will be kept without fail.
					
					 At the end of the inaugural ceremony the north side committee discussed the technical issues concerning the arrangement for the football match.

articles.title: 50th Founding Anniversary of ITF Marked
articles.content:
50th Founding Anniversary of ITF Marked
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday in commemoration of the 50th founding anniversary of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF).
					 Present at the meeting were ITF President Ri Yong Son, ITF Honorary President Chang Ung, ITF Vice-President Leong Wai Meng and his delegation, those concerned with Taekwon-Do, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned and Taekwon-Do instructors and coaches.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet, in a congratulatory speech said the ITF has developed into a prestigious and influential martial art organization comprising national associations in about 120 countries and tens of millions of Taekwon-Do practitioners since its foundation.
					
					 He wished the ITF greater success in its work, noting that the DPRK government would as ever send full support and encouragement to the ITF in its cause of disseminating and developing orthodox Taekwon-Do.
					
					 Ri Yong Son and Leong Wai Meng said the present reality in which the ITF was demonstrating its dignity and honor, holding its proud position in the world martial art circle would be unthinkable without the unsparing support and encouragement from the government of the DPRK, the cradle of Taekwon-Do.
					
					 They expressed the belief that the Taekwon-Do practitioners would work hard to disseminate orthodox Taekwon-Do worldwide and develop the ITF as desired by Choe Hong Hui by pooling wisdom and efforts.
					
					 At the meeting some Taekwon-Do players were awarded order, medal of merited instructor, diplomas and certificates for the seventh, eighth and ninth grades of the ITF in recognition of their contributions to demonstrating the might of Taekwon-Do and its dissemination and development.
					
					 The participants looked round the Holy Taekwon-Do Hall after watching a video documenting the loving care the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu had shown for Choe Hong Hui and the history of ITF development.
					
					 They enjoyed a demonstration of the Korean Taekwon-Do players and planted memorial trees.
					
					 The DPRK Cabinet hosted a reception Wednesday in honor of the participants in the events for marking the 50th founding anniversary of the ITF.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests, who are staying here to  take part in the 16th Meeting of the Steering Committee meeting of the Cooperative Development of Operational Safety and Continuing Airworthiness Programme of North Asia of the International Civil Aviation Organization visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President, they looked round the historical relics preserved at his old home.
					
					 They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.

articles.title: Foreign Embassy Officials Help Korean Co-op Farms
articles.content:
Foreign Embassy Officials Help Korean Co-op Farms
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Syed Sajjad Haider, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Pakistani embassy here, and its staff members did friendly labor at the DPRK-Pakistan Friendship Taesong Vegetable Co-op Farm on Wednesday.
					 They laid a bouquet before the monument to the field guidance given by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them before going round the room dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 They helped the farmers in weeding.
					
					 They handed over aid materials to the farm.
					
					 Meanwhile, Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy went to the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Vegetable Co-op Farm in Chollima District on the same day, went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the farm and donated aid materials for farming.

articles.title: Choe Hong Hui Remembered
articles.content:
Choe Hong Hui Remembered
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A memorial service took place at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri Wednesday on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of death of Choe Hong Hui, former president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF).
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Yong Son, president of the ITF, Chang Ung, honorary president of the ITF, a Taekwon-Do delegation led by Leong Wai Meng, vice-president of the ITF, those related to martial arts, bereaved family members, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned, Taekwon-Do instructors and coaches.
					
					 Wreaths in the names of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, ITF, International Martial Arts Games Committee and the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs and bouquets were laid before the grave of Choe Hong Hui.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Choe.
					
					 ITF President Ri Yong Son made a memorial address.
					
					 He referred to the feats Choe performed by founding the ITF and steering the work for developing orthodox Taekwon-Do into scientific martial arts and disseminating it throughout the world.
					
					 Choe's desire to contribute to building a peaceful world with Taekwon-Do will surely come true thanks to the joint efforts of all Taekwon-Do practitioners, he added.

articles.title: All Koreans Called on to Open Second June 15 Era of Reunification
articles.content:
All Koreans Called on to Open Second June 15 Era of Reunification
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The North Side, South Side and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued an appeal on Wednesday, the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The appeal said that with the adoption of the joint declaration the passion of all Koreans at home and abroad to settle the issue of national reunification independently by their concerted efforts pervaded the whole country.
					
					 But all the precious achievements made by the Koreans with much effort were ruthlessly destroyed by the anti-reunification forces, the appeal noted.
					
					 All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration called as follows reflecting its will to glorify this significant year as a historic year to be specially recorded in the history of the movement for national reunification by joining hands with all political parties, organizations and personages at home and abroad:
					
					 Let us thoroughly respect and implement the north-south joint declarations, the landmarks of the Koreans for reunification, and thus improve the inter-Korean relations and actively achieve national reconciliation and unity!
					
					 Let us open a new era of national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification by implementing the north-south joint declarations!
					
					 There can be neither the reunification of the country nor co-prosperity of the nation without peace.
					
					 All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration agreed to hold the event common to the nation in Kaesong to mark the 16th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, prompted by the patriotic stand to open a new chapter for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and independent reunification by bringing to success the nationwide great meeting for reunification.
					
					 Let us hold the event common to the nation and a football match between workers from the north and the south for reunification in Seoul on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation on all accounts, hold meeting of various public circles including young people, students, peasants, women, media persons, academicians and religious persons and thus liven up the atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations and open a new path of reconciliation and cooperation!
					
					 Let us resolutely hold back Japan's moves for reinvasion aimed at encroaching upon the territory and sovereignty of the Korean nation under the pretext of the military tension on the Korean peninsula and join efforts to provide the Koreans in Japan with the national right and vital right!
					
					 The appeal called for getting united under the banner of the north-south joint declaration to usher in the second June 15 era of reunification, a new era of peace and reunification, without fail.

articles.title: Infrastructure Project Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Infrastructure Project Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The infrastructure project for Ryomyong Street has been pushed forward in Pyongyang.
					 According to an official concerned, thanks to the great enthusiasm of builders, it took a little more than two months to carry out cylinder caisson projects for the intake of geothermal water 70 percent after the groundbreaking, with annexes framed at over 40 percent.
					
					 The North Hwanghae Provincial Brigade completed the Rungna cylinder caisson No. 1 within 20 days and is speeding up the projects for cylinder caisson Nos. 2, 3 and 4.
					
					 The Rason Municipal Brigade strives to build underground structures in quality, while the South Hwanghae Provincial Brigade concentrates its manpower on preparations for piping project.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Developing Sports
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Developing Sports
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Members of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians have made a series of achievements conducive to putting sports on a scientific basis. 
					 In hearty response to the call made by the Workers' Party of Korea to turn the DPRK into a sports power at an early date, they worked out programs for training weightlifters and archers.
					
					 They also developed a program for simulating and analyzing vault movements and aid programs for training divers and shooter and made high-quality trampoline and new marathon shoes.
					
					 Meanwhile, various health foodstuffs have been produced, which prove effective in relieving fatigue and supplementing nutriment.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made in Railway Transport of DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made in Railway Transport of DPRK
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Branch Academy of Railway Science under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences have recently made signal achievements conducive to the development of the nation's railway transport.
					 They succeeded in manufacturing a substitute converter for the existing subway train's dynamotor.
					
					 And they finished the technical designing for 10-odd projects at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex while settling the technical problems for its modernization.
					
					 Meanwhile, such programs helpful to updating the railway administration were developed as a system for video meeting on railway transport control.
					
					 Those scientists also made a progress in applying prestressed reinforced concrete sleeper and normalizing the production of plastic brake slipper for wagons and improving its quality.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made for Agricultural Development
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made for Agricultural Development
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the DPRK have made achievements helpful to putting the country's agriculture on an IT basis.
					 The Manufactory No. 111 of the State Academy of Sciences produced a new system for automatically observing the climate conditions in farm fields.
					
					 The system consists of sensor, weather data recorder, portable weather data collector, power unit, etc.
					
					 Researchers of Pyongyang University of Computer Science and Kim Po Hyon University jointly developed a program for agricultural production and labor control.
					
					 This program helps build up database on the characteristics of crop seeds and their cultivation methods and put the selection of seed and its cultivation method on a right basis. It also makes it possible to ensure rational distribution of manpower for each farm work.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands U.S. Stop Interfering in Internal Affairs of Venezuela
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands U.S. Stop Interfering in Internal Affairs of Venezuela
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Right-wing reactionaries of Venezuela are now going on the rampage demanding a referendum calling for the resignation of the president, creating social disorder and confusion.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday recalls that the Venezuelan government took such measures as declaring a state of emergency to cope with the prevailing situation and hails them as entirely just ones.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Many countries of the world express full support and solidarity with those measures, but only the U.S. is ratcheting up sanctions against Venezuela, describing those measures as "actions against democracy."
					
					 The ulterior aim of the U.S. is to bring down the left-wing governments in Latin America by all means and methods and thus turn the region into its "tranquil backyard" without any anti-Americanism.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal making the situation in the Latin American region complicated.
					
					 The U.S. should stop giving a shot in the arm of the right-wing reactionary forces of Latin American countries including Venezuela and halt at once its interference in the internal affairs of the region.
					
					 Issues in Latin America are the internal matters which should be solved by the peoples of the region and, therefore, the U.S. interference in them is unjustifiable.
					
					 The Korean people extend invariable support and solidarity to the struggle of the left-wing forces in the region including Venezuela which hold fast to the stand of independence and socialism against imperialism and boost mutual cooperation, and hope that the situation in the region will return to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Newspapers Call for Paving Broad Avenue to National Reunification
articles.content:
Newspapers Call for Paving Broad Avenue to National Reunification
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The first north-south summit took place in Pyongyang and the June 15 joint declaration core of which is the idea of By Korean Nation Itself was adopted in June, Juche 89 (2000) and it was the noteworthy event which laid the landmark for independent reunification and opened the historic turning point for national reunification, newspapers of the DPRK editorially say on Wednesday.
					 Rodong Sinmun says the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and great successes made in the subsequent period are the precious fruition of leader Kim Jong Il's idea and line for independent reunification and energetic leadership.
					
					 Noting that 16 years since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration proved that improved north-south relations, peace of the country and co-prosperity of the nation would be unthinkable without respecting and implementing the joint declaration, the daily goes on:
					
					 All Koreans are now faced with the important task for giving momentum to the strong trend of June 15 once again true to the three charters for national reunification and thus achieve independent reunification of the country.
					
					 It is important to hold aloft the banner of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 All Koreans should dynamically wage the struggle for peace against war in order to stop the warmongers at home and abroad from unhesitatingly bringing disaster of a nuclear war to this land.
					
					 They should decisively meet the challenges of the anti-reunification forces blocking the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is the principled stand of the DPRK re-clarified at the joint conference of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK to achieve independent reunification of the country by the peaceful means and federal formula under the unfurled banner of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to turn out as one in the drive for carrying out the new line and policies for national reunification clarified by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and pave a broad avenue to national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Insulting Victims of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
articles.content:
N. Korean Authorities Accused of Insulting Victims of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean authorities formally set up a preparatory committee for establishing the "foundation to support" sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army despite the opposition of victims and people from all walks of life.
					 The above-said foundation is aimed to hasten the implementation of the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army fabricated at the end of last year.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are persistently stepping up the establishment of the foundation, justifying it. This is no more than a treacherous action to gloss over with a petty amount of money the unpardonable sexual slavery the Japanese imperialists committed against Korean women.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces opted for the establishment of the foundation, pressurized by the dictation of their master Japan. This is little short of the wickedest act of unhesitatingly selling off the dignity and interests of the south Korean people to the Japs as the former are bereft of even an iota of self-respect.
					
					 The above-said act of treachery perpetrated by the south Korean authorities defying opposition of the people from all walks of life is aimed at rapidly clearing the hurdles lying in the way of improving the relations with Japan and tightening the military nexus for invading the north.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group has become undisguised in its military nexus with Japan at the instigation of the U.S. This amounts to paving the road for the Japanese reactionaries to stage a comeback to Korea.
					
					 This group of traitors should be thrown overboard without fail as they are unhesitatingly colluding with the sworn enemy of the Korean nation in a bid to invade the north.

articles.title: Marathon Rally for Reunification Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Marathon Rally for Reunification Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a marathon rally for reunification in Jonju, North Jolla Province of south Korea on June 12 to mark the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, according to the south Korean on-line paper Tongil News. It was sponsored by the North Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 Attending it were members of local autonomous bodies and institutions and dozens of civic and public organizations in North Jolla Province and citizens, youth and children, more than 3 000 in all.
					
					 The permanent representative of the North Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration said in an opening address that the great journey for peace and reunification made with the publication of the June 15 joint declaration was suspended due to the authorities' policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 He demanded the authorities create conditions to enable those from the south, the north and overseas to gather in one place to celebrate the anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The participants wearing the shirts emblazoned with letters "south-north reconciliation" and "realization of peace" ran 6.15 km amid the sound of three gongs symbolic of the north, the south and abroad, carrying the desire to open up a new era of independent reunification.

articles.title: Two Schoolgirls Remembered in S. Korea
articles.content:
Two Schoolgirls Remembered in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- There took place an event on June 13 for honoring the memory of two schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son in Yangju City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea, where they were mercilessly killed by an armored car of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces 14 years ago.
					 Attending it were ten odd civic and public organizations in south Korea including the committee for building a monument to the memory of Mi Son and Hyo Sun, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					
					 The participants honored the memory of the schoolgirls, staging a demonstration from the entrance to the village to the scene of the crime.
					
					 Speakers said that the GIs who drove an armored car over the two schoolgirls to death that day in 2002 have not been punished due to the unequal south Korea-U.S. Status of Forces Agreement (SOFA).
					
					 They pledged to carry on the struggle to probe the truth behind the killing of the two schoolgirls, punish those responsible and make the SOFA abrogated.
					
					 The participants moved to the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul and set up an incense-burning altar of citizens at which they held a candlelight rally for honoring the memory of the two schoolgirls.

articles.title: Bulgarian Body Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Bulgarian Body Praises Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, on June 9 released a statement on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Even though so many heads of state left their names to posterity, no one is as alive in the hearts of the world progressives for performing titanic exploits as Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He devoted his all to the people's happiness and country's prosperity.
					
					 He, a great thinker and theoretician, brightly lighted the way for humankind by developing in depth the Juche idea.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics, the Korean people were able to firmly protect the country's prestige and sovereignty and have powerful national defense capabilities.
					
					 He put in tireless efforts to reunify the country divided by the outsiders.
					
					 The adoption of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration provided the Korean people with the milestone for hastening national reunification, the long-cherished desire of the nation.

articles.title: Myanmar Political Figure Praises Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Exploits
articles.content:
Myanmar Political Figure Praises Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Exploits
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed for building and leading the party will be kept in the minds of humankind together with his august name forever.
					 Tha Win, member of the Central Committee and secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said this in a statement on June 9.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to strengthening the ideological and volitional unity and revolutionary unity of the whole party based on the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, since he started the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 His exploits for building and leading the party serve not only as a valuable heritage he left behind for his country and people but as an eternal foundation for guaranteeing the eternal victory of the WPK.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the single-minded unity of the Korean society was further consolidated as firm as a rock and the Korean people achieved eye-opening successes in all fields of the socialist construction.
					
					 The Korean people will make greater successes in their struggle to carry out the important tasks HE Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, set forth at the WPK Seventh Congress.
					
					 We send full support and solidarity to the party and people of the DPRK working to complete the socialist cause and achieve the independent reunification and global independence under the sagacious leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Opening Address at Seventh Congress of WPK Carried by Peruvian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Opening Address at Seventh Congress of WPK Carried by Peruvian Newspaper
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's opening address made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was carried by the May 24th issue of the Peruvian newspaper Accion Nacionalista.
					 The newspaper carried the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photo of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un waving back to the cheering masses in the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.

articles.title: German Body Supports Korean People's Cause of National Reunification
articles.content:
German Body Supports Korean People's Cause of National Reunification
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The German Group for Study of Korean Culture posted articles supporting the Korean people's cause of national reunification on its website on June 9 and 10 to observe the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 An article titled "Let's pave wide avenue to independent reunification!" noted:
					
					 It has been 70 odd years since Korea was divided by outside forces.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un is wisely steering the struggle for national reunification, the lifetime desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the earnest desire of all Koreans.
					
					 The Korean people are striving to remove the danger of war, defuse tensions and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un the Korean people will surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification and build a reunified and prospering socialist power.
					
					The website in an article titled "Improvement of relations between north and south of Korea is requirement of times" said that the Korean nation, a homogenous nation with the time-honored history spanning 5,000 years, has suffered from national division for more than 70 years due to the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have stoked confrontation and distrust while persistently blocking the way to national reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity, the article charged.
					
					 It urged the authorities to drop their narrow-minded confrontational idea and make a bold decision to get reconciled with the compatriots in the north as early as possible.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Observes Anniversary of Battle in Pochonbo during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Observes Anniversary of Battle in Pochonbo during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Flames in Pochonbo" on its website on June 1 to mark the 79th anniversary of the victorious battle in Pochonbo in Korea commanded by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 The article introduced the battle in details and said:
					
					 The battle in Pochonbo was a great event which disheartened the Japanese imperialists that styled themselves "emperor" in Asia.
					
					 The battle heralded the dawn of national resurrection as it instilled into the Korean people optimism and conviction that Korea was not dead but alive and that they could liberate the country without fail if they fought.
					
					 The liberation movement was activated in Korea and, particularly, the young people became increasingly enthusiastic to join the anti-Japanese guerilla army after the battle.
					
					 The Korean people upheld Kim Il Sung as the leader of the nation and savior of the national resurrection with the firm belief that he would certainly liberate Korea.
					
					 They finally saw the liberation of Korea on August 15, 1945.
					
					 Flames in Pochonbo demonstrated before the world the firm will of the Korean revolutionaries to start and advance the revolution with arms.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC entrega carta a Secretariado de ONU
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC entrega carta a Secretariado de ONU
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC) entrego el dia 13 al Secretariado de la ONU la carta aprobada en la conferencia conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la RPDC efectuada el dia 9 en esta capital.
					Es inmutable la voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC de abrir decididamente el ancho camino para solucionar el problema de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y la reunificacion de la patria en acato a la linea y orientacion presentadas por el Presidente del PTC, Kim Jong Un, y se inicio la lucha por ejecutarlo.
					
					Asi inicia la misiva y continua:
					
					Lo problematico es que cual actitud y posicion toma la ONU que tiene profundas relaciones con la division y la reunificacion de Corea y debe desempenar un rol importante en estos asuntos.
					
					Francamente dicho, la ONU tiene la responsabilidad historica, legal y moral de no dar espaldas al asunto de la reunificacion de Corea.
					
					Aunque pase mucho tiempo, seran imborrables los crimenes de la ONU que permitio a EE.UU. abusar de su nombre en intervenir injustamente en el problema coreano, fijar la division del Norte y el Sur y enviar las fuerzas multinacionales a la guerra de agresion en la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado acarreando las calamidades y sacrificios a los inocentes habitantes coreanos.
					
					Si la ONU no olvida su mision y deber de defender la paz y la seguridad de la humanidad y aspirar a la independencia del mundo y la justicia, debe ayudar sinceramente la lucha del pueblo coreano por realizar de manera independiente y  pacifica la reunificacion del pais, asi que debe indemnizar el dano impuesto por si mismo.
					
					Pero, ahora tambien, bajo el control trasero de EE.UU., la ONU trata injustamente a la RPDC, Estado soberano legitimo y digno miembro de la ONU, y se adhiere no a la reunificacion sino a la perpetuacion de la division de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La ONU no debe poner gran obstaculo en la aspiracion y el desarrollo independientes ejerciendo presion a los paises pequenos inclusive la RPDC con la pauta de doble rasero centrado en un pais, sino hacer merecida contribucion a la correcta solucion de los problemas presentados al ver correctamente su esencia con el punto de vista imparcial y sereno.
					
					La ONU debe comprender bien y apoyar nuestra voluntad de establecer el sistema de paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana y preparar el ambiente favorable a la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Si desea de veras la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region, la ONU debe ejercer la influencia para que EE.UU. renuncie la injusta ambicion de agresion y la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					Si desprecia la realidad de varios decenios sin calar a fondo la injusticia y la peligrosidad de la teoria de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" en que se obstinan unilateralmente las autoridades surcoreanas, la ONU obtendra la deshonra de organizacion impotente que se deja enganar por las tretas malintencionadas y sucias. 
					
					En particular, si el secretario general y otras personalidades principales que tienen el timonel de la ONU bailan al son de EE.UU., acostumbrado al despotismo y las arbitrariedades, aunque expresan la voluntad de intervenir en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y el problema de reunificacion de Corea, la ONU se hara un aparato carente de justicia e imparcialidad y una marioneta sin juicio propio ni autoridad. 
					
					Ahora estamos en el tiempo importante en que se deciden el destino y el futuro de la nacion coreana y tenemos la firme voluntad de abrir el ancho camino de reunificacion independiente al mejorar decisivamente las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					La ONU debe justipreciar la aspiracion de la nacion coreana y la tendencia de la epoca y hacer lo que debe hacer como organizacion con la mision de asegurar la paz. 
					
					Esperamos que el secretario general y otras personalidades responsables del Secretariado de la ONU hagan aporte al alivio de tension de la Peninsula Coreana y a la solucion del problema de reunificacion de Corea, asuntos de mayor atencion mundial, de modo que se escriba una pagina significativa en la historia de la ONU.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana advierte responder con represalia despiadada a provocacion militar de enemigos
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana advierte responder con represalia despiadada a provocacion militar de enemigos
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Frente a las imprudentes maniobras belicas de Estados Unidos, consolidaremos aun mas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo nuestro disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo y frustraremos las minimas provocaciones militares de los enemigos con el modo de enfrentamiento despiadado a nuestro estilo. 
					Asi respondio el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada hoy en relacion con que se elaboro en el territorio norteamericano el plan de "operacion de ataque aereo preciso" contra la RPDC.
					
					Ultimamente, una compania consultiva de informaciones estrategicas de Estados Unidos elaboro y publico un informe intitulado "Reaccion militar frente al problema nuclear del Norte de Corea", revelo y prosiguio: 
					
					La parte esencial del informe compuesto por 5 capitulos persigue "arrasar" la capacidad nuclear de la RPDC al ejecutar la "operacion de ataque aereo preciso" contra las instalaciones  nucleares y militares de ella.
					
					El informe tomo como blanco de ataque aereo varios objetos tales como las facilidades nucleares de Nyongbyon, el campo de construccion de la planta de energia atomica, las minas de uranio y las instalaciones de su enriquecimiento. Y previo destruir de una vez los misiles balisticos de nuestras fuerzas estrategicas, los bombarderos de fuerzas aereas y las facilidades de construccion de submarino al realizar simultaneamente el ataque aereo preciso. 
					
					Para ese fin, se preve movilizar decenas de bombarderos estrategicos B-2 cargados con las bombas atravesadoras de galerias de gran tamano y cazas tacticas F-22 y lanzar centenares de misiles cruceros Tomahawk desde varios submarinos nucleares tipo Ohio y los destructores.
					
					Se realiza abiertamente en el suelo norteamericano la discusion sobre la "operacion de ataque aereo preciso" contra la RPDC, lo cual es la expresion de la abierta ambicion de guerra de agresion a la RPDC de Estados Unidos que entra en la etapa extremadamente imprudente. 
					
					Se quedo publicado esta vez un informe extremadamente provocativo de asestar un ataque aereo preciso a las instalaciones y fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC, lo cual es la continuacion de la extremada presion de sancion anti-RPDC de la actual administracion norteamericana y sus maniobras de guerra nuclear. Y ademas es un testimonio claro de que se examinan y se preparan crucialmente el ataque sorpresivo y la invasion armada del imperio contra la RPDC.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que ese peligroso "guion de guerra" contra la RPDC fue publicado en visperas de los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Surcorea previstos en agosto proximo.
					
					Tambien la gravedad de la situacion reside en que como fue declarado en el presente informe, EE.UU. intenta estallar aun ahora mismo la guerra de gran envergadura destinada a aplastar militarmente a la RPDC suponiendo que la "operacion de ataque aereo preciso" se extenderia inevitablemente a una "guerra total".
					
					Tales tentativas de guerra agresiva de EE.UU., que se ven cada dia mas reales en la Peninsula Coreana, prueban una vez mas la justeza e inevitabilidad de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares presentada por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Comite Conjunto Nacional de 15 de Junio exhorta a reabrir epoca de reunificacion de 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Comite Conjunto Nacional de 15 de Junio exhorta a reabrir epoca de reunificacion de 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 16o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, los Comites Norteno, Sureno y Ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hicieron publica el dia 15 un llamamiento que senala en particular:
					Gracias a la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, reinaba en todo el territorio de tres mil ries el fervor de reunificacion de todos los coreanos para solucionar de manera independiente y con las fuerzas unidas nacionales el problema de reunificacion de la patria y todos los estratos estaban aunandose pasando la muralla de division.
					
					Pero, todos los exitos preciosos alcanzados a cambio de los esfuerzos tenaces de todos los coreanos fueron destruidos cruelmente por las fuerzas anti-reunificacion.
					
					Reflejando la voluntad de glorificar este ano como el historico a grabarse con letras doradas en la historia del movimiento de reunificacion de la patria estrechando mas fuertes las manos de diversos partidos politicos, las entidades y personalidades diferentes estratos del interior, exterior y ultramar, el Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio llamo como lo siguiente:
					
					!Mejoremos las relaciones intercoreanas y logremos activamente la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales al respetar y ejecutar estrictamente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, jalon de connacionales para la reunificacion! 
					
					!Abramos una era de reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la paz y la reunificacion mediante la ejecucion de la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur!
					
					Sin la paz no habra la reunificacion del pais ni la prosperidad comun de la nacion. 
					
					El Comite Conjunto Nacional por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio decidio realizar en Kaesong el acto conjunto nacional por el 16o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio partiendo de la posicion patriotica de abrir una nueva coyuntura favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y a la reunificacion independiente mediante la gran reunion pannacional por la reunificacion. 
					
					!Celebremos sin falta en Seul el acto conjunto nacional y el torneo de futbol de obreros Norte-Sur por la reunificacion con motivo del 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, elevemos el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas mediante la reanudacion de las reuniones de jovenes y estudiantes, campesinos, mujeres, medios de prensa, academicos, religiosos, etc. y abramos el nuevo horizonte de la reconciliacion y la cooperacion!
					
					!Solidaricemonos para frustrar las maniobras de nueva agresion de Japon tendentes a danar el territorio coreano y la soberania de la nacion coreana bajo pretexto de la tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana, y defender los derechos nacionales y la subsistencia de los compatriotas residentes en Japon!
					
					Por ultimo, la nota exhorta a unirse compactamente bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y allanar sin falta la nueva era de paz y reunificacion, o sea, la segunda era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio.

articles.title: Constituido comite norteno de promocion de torneo de futbol de obreros N-S
articles.content:
Constituido comite norteno de promocion de torneo de futbol de obreros N-S
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en esta capital la ceremonia de constitucion del comite norteno de promocion del torneo de futbol de obreros Norte-Sur de Corea por la reunificacion. 
					Asistieron los funcionarios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, los sindicatos industriales y los comites de la FGSC en la capital y otras localidades. 
					
					En la ocasion los oradores expresaron la seguridad de que el torneo de futbol de obreros Norte-Sur por la reunificacion, que se celebrara en Seul del Sur de Corea con motivo del 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, sera un importante motivo para eliminar el estado de confrontacion Norte-Sur, realizar la aspiracion nacional a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales. 
					
					Enfatizaron que llevaran a efecto la presente cita deportiva superando todas las pruebas y dificultades. 
					
					Para este fin, fue organizado el comite norteno de promocion del torneo de futbol de obreros Norte-Sur encabezado por el presidente Ju Yong Gil, presidente del Comite Central de la FGSC, y compuesto por los miembros del CC de la FGSC, los sindicatos industriales incluso el metalurgico y mecanico y el de industria ligera y quimica, y los funcionarios interesados segun el acuerdo de constituir el comite conjunto de promocion con las entidades de obreros del Sur de Corea. 
					
					En la ocasion fue publicada la declaracion constitucional del comite conjunto de promocion. 
					
					La nota senala que las tres entidades de obreros del Norte y el Sur de Corea se levantaran de nuevo en la practica y la lucha por defender la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y lograr la reconciliacion nacional y la paz, y continua:
					
					Primero, con motivo del 15 de agosto de este ano realizaremos sin falta en Seul el torneo de futbol de obreros Norte-Sur. 
					
					Estamos convencidos de que la decision y la practica de las tres entidades de obreros Norte-Sur seran un importante motivo para mejorar las empeoradas relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reconciliacion nacional y la paz y demandamos a las autoridades surcoreanas esforzarse con sinceridad por la marcha exitosa de la cita deportiva. 
					
					Segundo, nos levantaremos activamente en la lucha por prevenir la cada dia mas agravante crisis de guerra y asegurar la paz duradera de este territorio. 
					
					La guerra es el arruinamiento comun de la nacion y su primera victima sera los obreros de ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					La paz es precisamente la coexistencia y la coprosperidad de la nacion. Y el terreno de vida pacifica es el componente fundamental de la vida de los obreros coreanos, razon por la cual todos los obreros en el Norte y el Sur de Corea, sin excepcion alguna, rechazan la guerra y desean la paz.
					
					Tercero, fortaleceremos el comite conjunto nacional por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y cooperaremos activamente en lograr la unidad de todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar. 
					
					La situacion sigue compleja y tropezamos con muchas dificultades. 
					
					Pero, es invariable nuestra decision de estar al frente de la lucha por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Se cumplira sin falta la promesa de los obreros del Norte y el Sur de Corea de volver a encontrarse en Seul el 15 de agosto.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, el comite norteno de promocion discutio los problemas practicos para los preparativos del torneo.

articles.title: Celebran en Corea el 50o aniversario de fundacion de ITF
articles.content:
Celebran en Corea el 50o aniversario de fundacion de ITF
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto por el 50o aniversario de fundacion de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles).
					En la ocasion participaron el presidente de la ITF, Ri Yong Son, el presidente honorario de la misma entidad, Jang Ung, la delegacion de taekwondocas presidida por el vicepresidente de la ITF, Leong Wai Meng, los relacionados con el arte marcial coreano, el presidente del Comite Coreano de Taekwondo, Kim Kyong Ho, los funcionarios correspondientes, los taekwondocas y sus entrenadores.
					
					En su discurso de felicitacion, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin senalo que despues de la fundacion, la ITF se convirtio en la influyente organizacion de arte marcial que integra las asociaciones nacionales de mas de 120 paises del mundo y decenas de millones de taekwondocas.
					
					Subrayo que el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea seguira enviando el apoyo total y solidaridad a la causa de la ITF para la divulgacion y desarrollo de Taekwondo ortodoxo, y deseo mayores exitos en los futuros trabajos de la federacion.
					
					Ri Yong Son y Leong Wai Meng destacaron que la ITF ocupa la posicion digna en el circulo de artes marciales del mundo siendo dignificada y honrada y esta realidad es inconcebible sin el apoyo y solidaridad desinteresados del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					Expresaron la conviccion de que todos los taekwondocas avanzaran a pasos firmes y con las fuerzas unidas para la divulgacion del Taekwondo ortodoxo a lo largo del mundo y el desarrollo de la ITF como lo deseaba Choe Hong Hui.
					
					En la ocasion fueron otorgados la orden de ITF, la medalla de maestro benemerito, el diploma de honor, los certificados del septimo, octavo y noveno niveles de Taekwondo a los practicantes destacados en la divulgacion y desarrollo.
					
					Los participantes vieron un video que demuestra las benevolencias dispensadas por los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu para Choe Hong Hui y la historia de desarrollo de la ITF, y recorrieron la Villa de Taekwondo.
					
					Ademas presenciaron la presentacion modelo de los taekwondocas coreanos y plantaron arbol como recuerdo.
					
					El mismo dia, el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC ofrecio un banquete para los participantes en el acto por el 50o aniversario de fundacion de la ITF.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia sablazo de autoridades surcoreanas a victimas de esclavitud sexual
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia sablazo de autoridades surcoreanas a victimas de esclavitud sexual
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, pese a la oposicion de las victimas y diversos estratos, las autoridades surcoreanas instalaron oficialmente el llamado comite preparatorio para la constitucion de la "fundacion de apoyo" a las victimas de la esclavitud sexual para el ex ejercito japones. 
					La "fundacion de apoyo" persigue acelerar la ejecucion del humillante "acuerdo" del problema de esclavitud sexual para el ex ejercito japones acordado a finales del ano pasado.
					
					Revela asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido hoy y prosigue:
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas intentan justificar la instalacion de esa "fundacion" y promoverla a toda costa, lo cual es un imprudente proceder antinacional encaminado a evadir con minima cantidad de dinero el intolerable crimen de esclavitud sexual cometido por el imperio japones contra las mujeres coreanas.
					
					Acobardados ante la griteria de su amo japones, los titeres surcoreanos se entregaron a instalar dicha "fundacion", lo cual es el climax de traicion nacional que vende sin alguna vacilacion al imperio japones la dignidad y el interes de la poblacion surcoreana. 
					
					Con la instalacion de la "fundacion", las autoridades surcoreanas persiguen la meta de eliminar cuanto antes el obstaculo de la mejora de relaciones con Japon e intensificar la connivencia militar para la agresion al Norte.
					
					Deviene un perverso acto de traicion nacional que concedera a los reaccionarios japoneses el camino de reagresion, presentarse abiertamente en la confabulacion militar con el pais isla bajo la instigacion del imperio yanqui. 
					
					Son la horda de traidores a eliminarse categoricamente los compinches titeres que para lograr su ambicion de agredir al Norte confabulan sin titubeo con el enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica de injustificable intervencion de EE.UU. en asuntos internos de Venezuela
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica de injustificable intervencion de EE.UU. en asuntos internos de Venezuela
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los reaccionarios derechistas venezolanos exigen un plebiscito para la destitucion del presidente generando el desorden social.
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 15, el diario Rodong Sinmun califico de justas las medidas tomadas por el gobierno venezolano para enfrentarse a tal situacion como la declaracion del estado de emergencia.
					
					A pesar de que muchos paises expresan apoyo y solidaridad a esas medidas, Estados Unidos las describe como "acto antidemocratico" y recrudece la sancion contra Venezuela, denuncia el periodico y continua:
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. intenta eliminar por todos los medios los poderes izquierdistas de America Latina, a fin de hacerla nuevamente su "traspatio tranquilo".
					
					EE.UU. es el culpable principal del empeoramiento de situacion regional de America Latina.
					
					EE.UU. debe dejar de instigar a las fuerzas reaccionarias derechistas de Venezuela y otros paises latinoamericanos y parar de inmediato sus actos intervencionistas en ellos.
					
					El problema de America Latina lo deben resolver los mismos pueblos latinoamericanos.
					
					Deseando que se estabilice lo mas pronto posible la situacion regional, el pueblo coreano envia apoyo y solidaridad invariable a la lucha de las fuerzas izquierdistas de Venezuela y esa region que mantienen la posicion independiente antiimperialista y socialista y profundizan la cooperacion mutua.
